about_the_game:
Earth is on the verge of World War 3. The Great Nations of our civilization are poised to press the "launch missiles" glowing red buttons that we've all seen in the movies! But now it's real! Now, the world is finally about to succumb to nuclear explosions, devastating fire and endless turmoil. The people or our great globe are in uncontrollable panic and chaos is over-flowing amongst the lands!

But never fear..

Because Super Star Dan is here!

In "Life Saver", you control Dan the Super Star and must make your way through the almost endless emotions that have both caused this nuclear war. Dodge and destroy the raw fear and emotions of the people scared for their very lives! Balls of anger, trapezoids of rage, and pyramids of desolation are just a few of the obstacles in your way.

Use a mouse and keyboard or an Xbox compatible gamepad to control Super Star Dan and avoid letting your health bar located on the left side of the screen drop to zero. If your life ever drops to zero, there is no 'extra lives' and it's game over! Blast the incoming war time shapes of negative raw emotions that are trying to rip you apart while amassing a worthy war score! At the end of each level, choose to advance through the white door to proceed to the next level or spend your soul shards on upgrades by taking the green door. Keep in mind that spending your soul shards you've collected will lower your score multiplier, so there's always the temptation to keep going and risking death just to get a higher score!

Without your help and without a successful mission, all of life as we know it will be gone forever! ..Are you ready to do what it takes to save us all?

NOTICE:  This game is a work in progress and will get better with time and continued updates.  Eventually you'll be scavenging the remnants of war to find components that can help you build powerful devices that can aid you in battle.  In time, there will be more enemies with different attacks and much, much more!  All of my games have received numerous updates after they were launched and gotten deeper and progressively more content as each new update was added.  Expect the price to go up as the game evolves, but I want to get your ideas and feedback right here from an early beta state, so be sure and post your thoughts, suggestions, ideas, and bugs in the forums!  Steam leaderboards will be added soon so you can know where you stand against other players who play this game.  For now, just because I want to get this game out and get feedback, I'm going to price this game very affordable!  ..Buy the game NOW to watch it evolve and help to get your feedback in as well as lock in this early launch price!

highlighted.name: I survived after getting knocked down to just 1 health!
I got my first death trying to save the world!
I killed 100 Circles of Anger in a single game!
I killed 100 Trapezoids of Fear in a single game!

name: Life Saver

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 Ghz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB graphics card Minimum
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 650 or AMD HD 6870 or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Earth is on the verge of World War 3. All life as we know it will be gone tomorrow. Take control of "Super Star Dan" to build a super SSD that can store every DNA on earth before the world goes up in flames. "Life Saver" is a twin stick shooter that you don't want to miss out on!
